Rules Races Skills Equipment Spells

Spells

Tier 1 Thaumaturgy Spells

These spells require a Thaumaturgy Skill Score of 20 and drain 2 HP per casting.

Break [ritual: 2 rounds]: The non-magical object you hold in your hands break into two pieces as you desire. The cut can be as clean as you want.
Create Water: Water trickles slowly from an elemental rift in your closed fist as long as you concentrate.
Dark Vision: You can see in complete darkness as though it was twilight.
Detect Magic: You can detect magic users, spells, and magical items for the next 8 hours.
Drill: Create a hole in wood, stone or metal. The hole can be up to a meter in length and a few centimeters thick.
Levitate Object: Touched object (of max 200kg) levitates for 2 hours. It does retain its mass.
Light: Object shines like a candle for the next 8 hours.
Light Fire: snap your finger and light a candle, some dry kindling, etc.
Mend: You make a minor repair to a single object.
Message: Subject within 100 squares can hear a message that you whisper silently. If you know the subject well, the subject can be out of sight from you.
Nails [ritual: 5 minutes]: You make 10 nails magical. They can be pushed into any kind of non-magical wood with the bare hands. They will not come out again without force. They will not rust for 8 years.
Sonic Boom: You create an explosive sound centered on you. Anyone in adjacent squares must make a TOU check or suffer 2d6 Points of Damage.
Water Control, minor: You animate, change the texture, color or opacity of 10 liters of water within 10 squares of you for up to one hour.


Tier 2 Thaumaturgy Spells

These spells require a Thaumaturgy Skill Score of 30 and drain 5 HP per casting.

Binding Handshake [ritual: 1 minute]: The willing subject swears an oath while you draw a small symbol on some part of their body. If they break their oath within a year of swearing the oath they suffer 10d10 points of damage.
Control Athryss: You control a single Athryss creature within 20 squares.
Crane: Touched object (of max 200kg) can fly (at Movement Rate 6) and carry a load of up to 250kg for up to 8 hours.
Heat Mineral: You heat a single metal or stone object to extreme temperatures. The object will stay at that temperature as long as you concentrate on the spell. Anyone wearing the targeted mineral will suffer 2d6 points of damage per round.
Heat Tolerance [ritual: 5 minutes]: The subject gains Damage Reduction 20 against heat and fire damage.
Hold Breath: Touched subject does not need to breathe for the next 8 hours.
Prestidigitation: Minor magical tricks and illusions.
Temper [ritual: 1 minute]: You temper a touched iron-alloy object of max 10 kg.
Warmth: Touched subject gains Damage Resistance 20 for 8 hours.


Tier 3 Thaumaturgy Spells

These spells require a Thaumaturgy Skill Score of 40 and drain 8 HP per casting.

Destroy Undead: Destroys up to 5 undead subjects with up to 20 HP. All other undeads near you suffer 8d6 points of damage.
Dispell: You try to break a spell effect. You must succeed a number of Easy Skill Tests (using Witchcraft or Thaumaturgy) equal to the tier of spell you try to break.
Enchanted Contract [ritual: 5 minutes]: You inscribe a pre-drawn contract with magical runes. All parties then sign the contract and you put a final rune upon it. If any party willingly break the contract they suffer 10d10 points of damage. Destroying the contract will cancel the spell.
Firebolt: Ranged attack against subject, who can avoid damage (3d6) with an AGI Test.
You create a ball of reddish fire the size of your hand. It swirls between your hands, and with a throwing motion, you throw it towards your opponent, who is engulfed in flames.
Fly: Subject can fly (Movement Rate 6) for 5 minutes.
Paralyze Animal: The animal subject is paralyzed until it succeeds a WIL Test (made at the beginning of its turn each round).
Shape Athryss [ritual: 5 minutes]: You can transform an infant Athryss into another type of Athryss.
Shatter: Subject non-living object breaks in half.
Smelt, minor [ritual: 1 hour]: You extract the pure metal (not ore) from dirt, stone and water that contain trace metals or ore. You can extract the metal from material you touch - up to 1kg of metal can be extracted.
Stay Awake [ritual: 15 minutes]: All the effects of sleep deprivation are removed from the subject.
Stone to Glass [ritual: 5 minutes]: You convert up to 20kg of stone to glass.
Water Rift: You create a 20x20cm rift into the elemental plane of water. Water spews forth from it at violent rate (like a fire hose).


Tier 4 Thaumaturgy Spells

These spells require a Thaumaturgy Skill Score of 50 and drain 11 HP per casting.

Fireball: Create an explosion within 10 squares that affect 13 squares (3 square diameter). Subjects within the area can avoid damage (4d6) with an AGI Test.
Mold Mineral [ritual: 2 minutes]: You can mold a single metal or stone object (max 10kg) with your hands (not by tools). The object is not heated by this process and it remains moldable by you for 1 hour.
Smelt, Major [ritual: 2 hours]: You extract the pure metal (not ore) from dirt, stone and water that contain trace metals or ore. You extract the metal from minerals within a 250 meter radius. The metal is extracted from the area, and will slowly fly/levitate toward you.
Stay Awake (Spell): All effects of sleep deprivation are removed from the subject.
Wood to Stone [ritual: 5 minutes]: You turn one cubic meter of non-living wood into stone.


Tier 5 Thaumaturgy Spells

These spells require a Thaumaturgy Skill Score of 60 and drain 14 HP per casting.

Paralyze Person: The humanoid subject is paralyzed until it succeeds a WIL Test (made at the beginning of its turn each round).
Stone to Sand: You turn a touched up to one cubic meters of a stone object to fine sand.


Tier 6 Thaumaturgy Spells

These spells require a Thaumaturgy Skill Score of 70 and drain 17 HP per casting.

Paralyze Monster: The monstrous subject is paralyzed until it succeeds a WIL Test (made at the beginning of the subjects turn each round).


Tier 8 Thaumaturgy Spells

These spells require a Thaumaturgy Skill Score of 90 and drain 23 HP per casting.

Longevity [ritual: 24 hours]: The magic user will not age for the next year.


Tier 1 Witchcraft Spells

These spells require a Witchcraft Skill Score of 20 and drain 2 HP per casting.

Charmer [ritual: 1 hour]: Subject's CHA and Negotiation scores are increased by 20 points for 8 hours
Dark Vision: You can see in complete darkness as though it was twilight.
Detect Lies: You know when people tell you lies for the next 8 hours.
Detect Magic: You can detect magic users, spells, and magical items for the next 8 hours.
Light: Object shines like a candle for the next 8 hours.
Message: Subject within 100 squares can hear a message that you whisper silently. If you know the subject well, the subject can be out of sight from you.
Paralyze Animal: The animal subject is paralyzed until it succeeds a WIL Test (made at the beginning of its turn each round).
Prestidigitation: Minor magical tricks and illusions.
Purify: You purify food or water, making it potable.
Stay Awake [ritual: 15 minutes]: All the effects of sleep deprivation are removed from the subject.
Warmth: Touched subject gains Damage Resistance 20 for 8 hours.


Tier 2 Witchcraft Spells

These spells require a Witchcraft Skill Score of 30 and drain 5 HP per casting.

Animal Essense: You gain any attribute of the animal that is greater than yours for 10 minutes.
Binding Handshake [ritual: 1 minute]: The willing subject swears an oath while you draw a small symbol on some part of their body. If they break their oath within a year of swearing the oath they suffer 10d10 points of damage.
Break [ritual: 2 rounds]: The non-magical object you hold in your hands break into two pieces as you desire. The cut can be as clean as you want.
Calm: You calm an enraged or frightend subject. If subject is magically frightened or enraged, they have to succeed an Easy WIL Test in order to counter that spell.
Control Athryss: You control a single Athryss creature within 20 squares.
Cure Disease: Touched subject is cured of their diseases and infections.
Dark Vision, Other: Subject can see in complete darkness as though it was twilight.
Drill: Create a hole in wood, stone or metal. The hole can be up to a meter in length and a few centimeters thick.
Friend Doll [ritual: 30 minutes]: You create a small doll that includes hair, nail clippings or similar from the subject. As long as you hold he doll in your hands, the subject considers you a friend. Letting go of the doll will end the spell. Any violent action towards the subject will cause the doll to burst into flame.
Healing Touch, Minor: Touched subject recovers 4d6 HP
Levitate Object: Touched object (of max 200kg) levitates for 2 hours. It does retain its mass.
Light Fire: snap your finger and light a candle, some dry kindling, etc.
Resiliance: Touched subject gains 10 Temporary Hit Points that last for 8 hours.
Stay Awake (Spell): All effects of sleep deprivation are removed from the subject.
True Sight: Hear or see any location within 100 squares for 10 rounds, one location per round.
Unseen: Subject is unnoticable (by normal senses, but not magic) for 5 minutes or until it attacks.
Wood Durability [ritual: 2 minutes]: Protects a cubic meter of wood from rot, mold, weather, etc. The wood lasts 10 times as long as unprotected wood.


Tier 3 Witchcraft Spells

These spells require a Witchcraft Skill Score of 40 and drain 8 HP per casting.

Animal Weapon: You gain the claws, talons, punces, tail or even head (bite) of an animal. Your unarmed combat damage is replaced by the one of the animal for 10 minutes.
Crane: Touched object (of max 200kg) can fly (at Movement Rate 6) and carry a load of up to 250kg for up to 8 hours.
Dispell: You try to break a spell effect. You must succeed a number of Easy Skill Tests (using Witchcraft or Thaumaturgy) equal to the tier of spell you try to break.
Enchanted Contract [ritual: 5 minutes]: You inscribe a pre-drawn contract with magical runes. All parties then sign the contract and you put a final rune upon it. If any party willingly break the contract they suffer 10d10 points of damage. Destroying the contract will cancel the spell.
Healing Touch, Moderate: Touched subject recover 6d6 HP.
Healing Zone [ritual: 2 hours]: All subjects within 3 squares of you regain 4d6 HP
Hold Breath: Touched subject does not need to breathe for the next 8 hours.
Paralyze Person: The humanoid subject is paralyzed until it succeeds a WIL Test (made at the beginning of its turn each round).
Purify, Area [ritual: 1 hour]: The soil and flora within 200 squares of you is healed and cured of any natural diseases.
Shape Athryss [ritual: 5 minutes]: You can transform an infant Athryss into another type of Athryss.
Sonic Boom: You create an explosive sound centered on you. Anyone in adjacent squares must make a TOU check or suffer 2d6 Points of Damage.
Stay Awake, Mass [ritual: 2 hours]: you remove the effects of sleep deprivation from all subjects within 5 squares of you.


Tier 4 Witchcraft Spells

These spells require a Witchcraft Skill Score of 50 and drain 11 HP per casting.

Friend: Subject considers you a friend for the next 8 hours. Any violent action towards the subject will cancel the spell.
Healing Rite [ritual: 15 minutes]: The subject regains all their hit points.
Paralyze Monster: The monstrous subject is paralyzed until it succeeds a WIL Test (made at the beginning of the subjects turn each round).
Revivify: Touched subject who has died within the last minute is brought back to life with 1 HP.
Shatter: Subject non-living object breaks in half.
